plugins.name: Scroll to Top Button
plugins.description: This plugin features a dynamic ring that indicates your scroll progress and provides a smooth scroll to the top when clicked.

plugins.name: Food & Drink Menu Manager
plugins.description: Effortlessly display your food / drinks menu with categorized tabs. Fully responsive and simple to update and control.

plugins.name: Portfolio Plus
plugins.description: All the missing features you wish Portfolio collections could do, now at your finger tips

plugins.name: Real Estate Listings
plugins.description: Showcase your real estate listings with ease, displaying key details like room count, bedrooms, and more. Easily managed through a Google Sheet for quick updates.

plugins.name: Video Thumbnail Previews
plugins.description: Add auto-playing video previews to your Portfolio collections, blog posts, and summary blocks.
